title.rendered: From Startup to Six-Figure Revenue in 12 Months Using SharpSpring Marketing Automation

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1564515838239{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1573232365997{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Agencies have to move fast to provide results for their clients, and working with a start-up business can be especially make-or-break.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1573488486021{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]When SharpSpring partner Incrento partnered with travel and leisure industry start-up, Wanderbus Ecuador, the company faced many of the typical start-up woes.

They needed a lower-cost option that would allow them to tailor their email marketing strategy to incite value at every moment in the buyers’ journey. They also needed to be able to report quickly on what was working and what wasn’t.

In this case study, you’ll find out how Incrento used marketing automation to:

  • Help close business by sending exactly the right message at exactly the right time using powerful, behavioral-based communication.
  • Show measurable results with comprehensive lead-to-revenue reporting.
  • Grow their agency by developing a new pricing model.
  • And much more…

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-testimonial”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent hide-cta” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
